attributes.action: dissolve Parliament and call a General Election immediately in the interests of democracy so that  British people can have the promised referendum on the Lisbon Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is totally undemocratic that an unelected Prime Minister and unelected and previously disgraced Lord Mandelson should sign away Britain's sovereignty and support Tony Blair as President of Europe.  It is quite outrageous that the British people have had no opportunity to voice their views in these matters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
